member.name: M:System.ServiceProviderExtensions.TryGetService``1(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Gets type-based services from the service provider.
member.typeparam: The type of the service to get.
member.returns: The requested service, or a reference if the service could not be located.

member.typeparam: The type of the service to get.
member.returns: The requested service, or throws an if the service was not found.
